{% if letter_head %} {{letter_head}} {% endif %}

Project Based – Services Contract

Prepared by:

Elite Resources Center Location Riyadh, Saudi Arabia, CR 1010492008, Address 4233, Othman Bin Affin RD, 7544.

Represented By:

Mr. Mohammed Majed Alsharhan – Managing Director

Created for:

{{doc.salutation}}. {{doc.full_name}} – Consultant - {{doc.job_title}}

{{doc.nationality}}

    (this “Contract” or this “Project Based – Services Contract”), is entered into and made effective as of {{doc.get_formatted("start_date")}} (the “Effective Date”), by and between Elite Resources Center, with an office located at Riyadh, Saudi Arabia, Othman Bin Affin RD and shall be referred to as the first party, and {{doc.salutation}}. {{doc.full_name}} shall be referred to as (“Part Time – {{doc.job_title}}”).

WHEREAS:

First Party who is an official manpower representative for Misk Foundation in it is manpower supply, where Misk Foundation has a need for Part Time – {{doc.job_title}} and the; Second Party has an interest, and the knowledge in performing such services for Misk Foundation; and the parties wish to set forth the terms and conditions upon which such services will be provided to Misk Foundation.

NOW THEREFORE, in consideration of the foregoing, and the mutual agreement herein contained, the parties hereby agree as follows:

Scoop of Services:

  • As per agreed work of Misk Foundation ad the second party (Part- timer).

Timeline:

  • Consultation Working Days: to be agreed by both parties on a daily attendance shared with ERC by monthly basis

Deliverables:

  • Deliverables shall be agreed on with the First Party’s representative in Misk Foundation’s technical concerned department, on a weekly basis with the second party.

Project Schedule:

  • This project shall be effective on {{doc.get_formatted("start_date")}}, for {{doc.duration_in_months}} months unless the first party deemed the dates as per the project’s demand and requirements, where the second party has to be informed officially 7 annual days prior of that decision.

Pricing and Rates:

  • The Second party or the (Part Time – {{doc.job_title}}) shall be entitled for a {{doc.pricing_base_on}} rate:

    •    of {{doc.get_formatted("rate")}} SAR for a {{doc.pricing_base_on}} basis.

    only on the days that are required and officially sent by the First Party’s representative in Misk Foundation. The Second party or the (Part Time – {{doc.job_title}}).

Payment Terms and Schedule:

  • The Second party or the (Part Time – {{doc.job_title}}) will be entitled for the payment of the complete attended days, that are agreed and approved by the First Party’s representative in Misk Foundation after 14 working days from the date of receiving the official approved attendance sheet from the technical department.

Terms and Conditions:

  • The approved days from the First Party’s representative Misk Foundation shall be audited based on a deliverable agreement sat by the two parties prior to the beginning of the project.

IN WITNESS WHEREOF, by their respective signatures below, the parties have caused the Contract, as of the Effective Date of {{doc.get_formatted("start_date")}}
